target: i have not given much thought to what to do when i get out .
context: <user> 11 hello i am in canada where are you ? <system> i am in a jail for kids <user> 12 for kids ? that does not make sense . <system> i got caught shoplifting and they locked me up <user> 13 how is that because of kids ? did you graduate from high school ? i did not . <system> i am still a kid . i want to go back to school <user> 14 graduate well your in jail . come out better then you went in . <system> i get out next month . my mom is visiting tomorrow<user> 15 well make a plan with her to get your life back on track <system> do you work ? what do you do ?<user> 16 yes in the army . you could try that when you get out <system> do you like working in the army ?<user> 17 yes it is a bit of a family thing . my grand father was in world war 2 . <system> i guess that made your decision to enlist easy<user> 18 yes it did . what do you want to do ? <system>
